mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, email, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, email, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
